backend/main.mo: Defines data models and comparators for photos, videos, events, special moments, and related upload/filter types, integrating blob storage and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for feature tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point configuring SEO metadata and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router structure, global layout, theme provider, visitor recording, and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventManag: Admin interface for creating, editing, deleting events, managing event images, and setting event passwords.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterEdit: Admin UI for editing footer contact details and social media links with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Handles selecting, previewing, batching, and uploading multiple photos with progress tracking and deletion support.
frontend/src/components/admin/Shortlists: Displays user shortlists grouped by event, provides event filtering, and shows summary statistics.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpecialMom: Manages creation of special moments and uploading/deleting associated images with validation and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserStatis: Computes and displays photo-related statistics and a table of most‑liked photos.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoUploa: Supports selecting, previewing, uploading, and deleting videos with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/VisitorsSe: Admin-only table showing paginated visitor records with roles and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessHelpe: UI helper showing a user's principal and instructions for granting admin access, including copy actions and re-init flow.
frontend/src/components/EventPasswordPro: Modal dialog prompting users to enter a password for protected events with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer with contact email, social media links, and a copyright line using fetched footer content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides site navigation, login/logout handling, mobile menu toggling, and conditional admin link display.
frontend/src/components/PhotoActions.tsx: Adds like and download actions for photos, handling authentication, mutation calls, and UI state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to set up their profile and submit their name.
Empty component file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Updates SEO meta tags based on the selected page configuration and optional overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identity, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for user profiles, admin checks, media, events, and visitors.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Adds touch-based left/right swipe detection with configurable thresholds.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining cinematic light/dark themes, scrollbars, textures, and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/blob-utils.ts: Utilities for converting, downloading, and batch-processing ExternalBlob images, including JPEG conversion.
frontend/src/lib/qrcode-local.ts: Empty placeholder file for local QR code utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qrcode-utils.ts: Empty utility file for QR code-related functionality.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides SEO configuration defaults and functions to dynamically update meta, Open Graph, Twitter Card, and canonical tags.
frontend/src/lib/upload-utils.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/lib/useQRCodeLibrary.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented functionality.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React rendering with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page handling authentication, admin checks, and rendering various management sections.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessInfoPage.tsx: Renders business info, service descriptions, and footer data with a hero section and SEO integration.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single event’s details and images with a lightbox viewer and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/EventPage.tsx: Full event page supporting authentication, password protection, image gallery, shortlisting, and downloads.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders an events list with sorting, authentication gating, and cinematic UI elements using data from useGetAllEventsSorted.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a favorites page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero, service sections, and links to photo and video galleries with cinematic styling.
frontend/src/pages/MediaGroupPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a media group page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single photo with swipe, keyboard navigation, and actions, loading photos via useGetAllPhotosSorted.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Displays the photo gallery with sorting, loading states, and navigation to individual photo pages.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a portfolio page.
frontend/src/pages/RobotsPage.tsx: Generates and displays robots.txt content dynamically in the browser.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Generates an XML sitemap and displays it while providing a downloadable file.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentPage.tsx: Shows a special moment's images with individual and batch download support, using useGetSpecialMoment.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentsPage.ts: React page that fetches and displays sorted special moments with cinematic styling, sort controls, loading/error states, and a grid of moment cards.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Video gallery page that requires authentication, supports sorting, shows a login prompt when unauthenticated, and displays selectable videos with a modal viewer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted URL state including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, shadows, containers, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site status, existing features, known issues, and pending requests for the Sumit Photo and Videography project.
